A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is brilliant. Don’t be influenced by the haters. The themes are clear and consistent and everything that happens\, happens for a reason. It took me two viewings to understand fully\, but Rian Johnson has crafted a masterpiece. This is a movie about living in the moment and learning from your past failures to become what you are meant to be. Can’t wait to see what comes next!
